The Five Impossible Tasks - A Jewelled Branch from the Mystical Island of Horai
kDesc
With silver roots, gold stems and branches made of pearl.[#Legal]
Racines d’un blanc argent, tronc d’or et branches couvertes de vraies perles.[#Legal]
Die Wurzel ist silbern weiß, der Stengel golden, die Zweige aus echten Perlen. [#Legal]
Le radici sono argentee, il tronco è dorato e i frutti sono fatti di madreperla. [#Legal]
Las raíces son plateadas, el tronco es de oro y las ramas están hechas de perlas.[#Legal]
根は白銀、茎は黄金、実は真珠で出来ているとされる木の枝。[#Legal]
가지는 백은, 줄기는 황금, 열매는 진주로 만들어진 나무.[#Legal]
With silver roots, gold stems and branches made of pearl.[#Legal]
根為白銀，莖為黃金，而樹枝據說是用珍珠製成。[#Legal]
根為白銀，莖為黃金，而樹枝據說是用珍珠製成。[#Legal]
With silver roots, gold stems and branches made of pearl.[#Legal]
